content: Majoring in mathematics and minoring in political science
Relevant coursework includes Analysis, Abstract Algebra, Graph Theory, Mathematical Software

positions.title: Help Desk Assistant
content: Provided customer support to faculty, staff, and students
Collaborated with a large team to ensure availability and stability of the university network

positions.title: Project Leader
content: Planned the migration of TeachAids.org, a large WordPress site with approximately (x) monthly users and over (x) pages to (cms), with a focus on long-term customizability and longevity, and led a team of 3 interns to successfully execute the migration.
Utilized React.js, Sass, Basscss, and Material UI to re-implement the existing design in an accessible and responsive format, and set up deployment to Firebase via GitHub Actions
Built a custom-built static site generation plugin for Vite for development and builds

positions.title: Intern Web Developer
content: Collaborated with a team of over 20 college students and industry professionals to use React.js, Material UI, and Basscss to implement the UIs for the CrashCourse Story Wall and CoviDB
Maintained an automated content collection and AI-powered article summarization system for the 5,000+ articles in CoviDB, written in Python and automated via GitHub Actions

positions.title: Developer
content: Collaborated with Professor Michael Davidson and a graphic designer to rebuild pwrlab.org into a modern, mobile friendly, and highly accessible website.
Used complex features of Jekyll and Liquid to make the site easily modifiable and extensible, including ensuring seamless compatibility with content written for the previous iteration
Documented the custom features of the new site, enabling Professor Davidson to modify content as needed.
